column5: Haven't seen this posted yet.  Kind of hard to believe they caught it on camera and the cameraman was so chilled out as it happened, but there it is.  Be careful out there!  http://www.owensoundsuntimes.com/2014/03/03/snowmobiler-rescued-from-georgian-bay
Interesting that the other driver decides to drive up to him....  Hopefully everyone was ok
Yikes..Looks like the sledder managed to skip to the solid ice and hang on..wow
